snippet.title: Bridge Strike - official trailer
snippet.description:
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/bridge-strike-switch/
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=pl.zorilla.bridgestrike
iOS: https://apps.apple.com/app/bridge-strike/id1441645223

This is official trailer of our game Bridge Strike. 

Bridge Strike is our homage to the famous River Raid.

Get behind the controls of our plane and fight for peace. You are our last hope!

The game has stunning old school pixel graphics, a dedicated chiptune soundtrack and SFX and features several types of terrain across diverse and demanding missions.

Bridge Strike is available on Nintento Switch, Android and iOS. PC? Staty tuned ;)

This video was made by Dariusz Rogalski (Pixel Nation)
Music was composed by Michał Chołost.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Project-R3D-321942698484408

Twitter: https://twitter.com/R3D696

http://www.bridgestrike.pl
